content: Stream created by Christian Williams.
Request and provide good materials / ways to learn a subject.
Nathanael Arkor changed the access permissions for this stream from Public to Web-public.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

Requesting and providing good materials/ways to learn a subject.

  • New description:

Deprecated, use #learning: reading & references instead. Requesting and providing good materials/ways to learn a subject.
Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream learning: recommendations to deprecated: recommendations.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the posting permissions for this stream:

  • Old permissions: All stream members can post.
  • New permissions: Only organization administrators and moderators can post.
